favourite.article: This is a marvelous footnote. I thought the original tune on guitar sounded much more moving during the 1 Corinthians Life-Study Training.

At last, it was posted on hymnal.net. To love Him is the indispensable requirement. Whatever we do in the church life, whether services, meeting, prophesying etc., the important is we must Love the Lord with the Whole of our might which is an indispensable requirement. Lord Jesus we Love You.
